Created_By.title: Created By
Created_By.description: The name of the user who created this object. It is set by the application and cannot be edited.

Creation_Date.title: Creation Date
Creation_Date.description: The date and time this object was created. It is set by the application and cannot be edited.

Last_Modification_Date.title: Last Modification Date
Last_Modification_Date.description: The most recent date and time this object was changed. It is set by the application and cannot be edited.

Last_Modified_By.title: Last Modified By
Last_Modified_By.description: The name of the last user who edited this object. It is set by the application and cannot be edited.

Location.title: Folder
Location.description: The path of this object within this object hierarchy. It cannot be edited after it is created.

Orphan.title: Orphan
Orphan.description: Displays the orphan status of the object.

OPSS_AI_Actual_Completion_Date.title: Actual Completion Date
OPSS_AI_Actual_Completion_Date.description: Use to record the date when the work on this action item was actually completed.

OPSS_AI_Additional_Description.title: Additional Description
OPSS_AI_Additional_Description.description: Use to enter or edit additional information about this action item.

OPSS_AI_Assignee.title: Action Assignee
OPSS_AI_Assignee.description: Use to assign a person ownership or responsibility for this action item.

OPSS_AI_Due_Date.title: Due Date
OPSS_AI_Due_Date.description: Use to indicate the date after which this issue action item is overdue.

OPSS_AI_Expected_Completion_Date.title: Expected Completion Date
OPSS_AI_Expected_Completion_Date.description: Use to set the expected completion date for this action item.

OPSS_AI_Issue_Owner_for_Approval.title: Issue Owner for Approval
OPSS_AI_Issue_Owner_for_Approval.description: Use to capture the name of the expected approver for the closure of the action. If blank, this will be inherited from the parent issue.

OPSS_AI_Percent_Complete.title: Percent Complete
OPSS_AI_Percent_Complete.description: Use to indicate the progress of this action item.  Enter a numeric value between 0 and 100.

OPSS_AI_Start_Date.title: Start Date
OPSS_AI_Start_Date.description: Use to record the date when the work on this action item started.

OPSS_AI_Status.title: Status
OPSS_AI_Status.description: Updated automatically by the system upon Submission for Approval and Acceptance Closure

OPSS_AI_Submit_for_Approval.title: Submit for Approval
OPSS_AI_Submit_for_Approval.description: Saving the Action with this field set to Yes will update the Status to Awating Approval
